title: Netflix grants WBD waiver to reopen deal talks with Paramount, Sarandos says 'let them make a move'
summary_full: Warner Bros. Discovery on Tuesday said it will engage in deal talks with Paramount Skydance under a 7-day waiver from Netflix.
summary_public: Warner Bros. Discovery on Tuesday said it will engage in deal talks with Paramount Skydance under a 7-day waiver from Netflix.
